In the Bronx, residents at the Castle Hill NYCHA housing complex are facing severe issues with no heat and water, while a winter storm threatens freezing rain and snow across NYC; meanwhile, Mayor Mamdani is addressing various local challenges, including a recent deadly shooting and ongoing nurse strikes.

### Risks & Alerts

- Castle Hill NYCHA housing complex in the Bronx is experiencing outages of heat and water. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- A storm is expected to bring freezing rain to NYC on Tuesday night. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Uncertainty surrounds a west-to-east storm that could bring snow to NYC this weekend. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- A man in Riverdale, Bronx, broke three ribs after slipping on black ice. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- National Grid reports record gas usage during NYC's recent cold snap. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMingFBVV95cUxPQklmYVJLZ3NHcEhMa2pWZloxQ0ZJZmcxWUhfUHFXSHJHOFYxc0ZFaVM4MFNSYlh2Y1E1Z21EMmFVclItZERnbGJsUXZSdGkxbUZHX2t2dFJCZGdvRWJzeFBVdl80NkRZM0lGZTd4QV9jd2pGRU5hZ0ZhYUVLWk10aDYzY3NETWVzQVdHeTc2anFrU3c0X1U1TWx6YWtEZw?oc=5)
- NJ Transit expects normal weekday commutes on Tuesday after Monday's overhead wire issues. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
